channel.title: [317] Special attack hits user, but not really
channel.description:
Well this is interesting.
Whenever I use a special attack on an NPC, my damage goes up, but so does the NPC's. BUT, the npc's attack does not take away any HP. It does f*ck up the npc's attack because of it though. While I was using a special attack on a lvl 21 gaurd, I hit the gaurd for 18, but the gaurd hit me for 34 :S
Any ideas what might cause this? I checked my special attack codes but can't find anything wierd.
Regards, SirPali

item.title: [317] Special attack hits user, but not really
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Hmm alright.
I’ll just use hitDiff then
That seems to work like you said. Atleast, i think it does. Still get hit high from time to time.
Ah whatever, i’ll figure it out.

Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Special attack hits user, but not really

item.title: [317] Special attack hits user, but not really
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

It’s a problem with the getHit and npcDamage method. I just use hitDiff =, seems to work fine.

Read full topic
